data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jeong, Soo-Hyun, Han, Ho-Yeon (2019): A taxonomic revision of the genus Xylota Meigen (Diptera: Syrphidae) in Korea. Zootaxa 4661 (3): 457-493, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4661.3.3|227 occurrences
